div.h5: The WCPS Central Office phone number is currently unavailable. Please dial 540-636-0999 for all calls to the Warren County School Board Office.

section.h1: Welcome to the Warren County Public School’s website

p.span: A number of years ago our school division adopted the theme The Trek to Excellence Takes Everyone. Community members, community leadership, parents, school staff and students all play a part on our trek to excellence. What we have learned is that our public schools are part of what makes our community a vibrant place to work, live and play. The strength of our school system impacts the strength of our community.

Our trek is ongoing and we continue to need everyone to be an active participant to ensure that all of our students reach their highest potential as they experience the Warren County Public School system. The support our community shows for our students makes all the difference in their success.
Thank you for supporting our students and please do not hesitate to contact your child’s school, any of our departments or us if you have questions, ideas or concerns.

a.data-text: Welcome to Warren County Public Schools
